I am _ American. My name _ Lily. I am a new student. I am twelve. Now I am _ Class Six, Grade One, No.5 Middle School. My teacher is Miss Li. I have a sister. _ name is Lucy. We _ twins . We look the same . But she is in a different school.
I am on duty today. I can't look after my sister. _ school I help my teacher put her book, map and pictures on her  _ . I tell her everyone is here, _ I am wrong. Jim is not at school. I don't  _  where he is. I think he is at home.
